channel.title: Compiling Trouble
channel.description: Ok I cannot see what's wrong with this, can anyone fix? It's in NPCHANDLER.Java [code] NPCHandler.java:553: 'else' without 'if' } else if (npcs[i].IsDead == true) { ^ 1 error Files Compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

bluurr:

what did you add above it

							npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
